fields.name: textCS
fields.fieldText:
Based on your selections, the member has opted for {!varOption}. A {!varDocument} will be sent to {!ContactNameFlowTerm}. If this is incorrect, please click the Previous button to make corrections.
If this information is correct, please click Next. This will send the {!varDocument} to the member and create a task for you to deactivate the employee. The case will be marked as Pending Deactivation. Once you have deactivated the employee, you may close the case.

fields.name: What_option_did_the_Lay_member_select
fields.fieldText: What option did the Lay member select?

fields.fieldText: What option did the Lay member select?

fields.fieldText: Did the member respond with their selected option?

fields.name: What_option_did_the_Minister_select2
fields.fieldText: What option did the Minister select?

fields.name: text3MNS
fields.fieldText:
You have indicated that the member has opted for 3 Months No Salary. If this is incorrect, click Previous below and select a different option.
If this is correct, click Next. This case will be marked On Hold and a task will be created for you to revisit it 70 days from the day the case was originally opened, on {!add70}. At that time, you will click the Revisit Case button again and you will reevaluate the case based on the member's communication in that time.

fields.name: text30
fields.fieldText:
The member has until {!add30} to make select an option. By that date, if they have not yet responded, they will be sent the options form again. If they still have not yet responded after, a Termination Confirmation Letter will be sent to them.


Please click Next to return to the case.

fields.name: text70
fields.fieldText:
The member has until {!add70} to make select an option. By that date, if they have not yet responded, they will be sent the options form again. If by {!add90} they still have not yet responded, a Termination Confirmation Letter will be sent to them.
Please click Next to return to the case.
